component.name: LandSurface
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurface required

component.name: LandSurfaceKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceKeyProperties required

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Decription of the basic approximations made in the LandSurface model.

parameter.name: Genealogy
parameter.definition: History of parent models.

parameter.name: CouplingWithAtmosphere
parameter.definition: Specify the treatment of land surface coupling with the Atmosphere model component

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: Specify which prognostic variables are included in the land surface scheme

parameter.name: WaterTreatment
parameter.definition: Specify the treatment of water to ocean

value.name: All water sent to ocean (with a lag)

constraint.name: if WaterTreatment is "All water sent to ocean (with a lag)"

parameter.name: LagOfWaterDischarge
parameter.definition: Value of the lag duration of the water discharge into ocean.

parameter.name: WaterStorageMethod
parameter.definition: Give further details of the water storage method

component.name: LandSurfaceSpaceConfig
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceSpaceConfig required

parameter.name: Tiling
parameter.definition: Is land surface tiling common to all land surface subcomponents?

constraint.name: if Tiling is "common to all LS subcomponents"

parameter.name: TilingMethod
parameter.definition: Describe the method of tiling used

parameter.name: GridConfig
parameter.definition: Is the grid used the same as that of the atmosphere?

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the land surface model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the horizontal grid used for land surface.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Is the time stepping framework used the same as that used in the atmosphere model component?

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Enter the length of timestep in seconds

component.name: LandSurfaceSoil
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceSoil required

parameter.name: Texture
parameter.definition: Description of the relative clay, sand and silt proportions of the soil

parameter.name: Structure
parameter.definition: Description of the aggregate characteristics of the soil particles

parameter.name: Albedo
parameter.definition: Ratio of reflected to incoming solar radiation on a land surface

parameter.name: WaterTable
parameter.definition: Description of the level of water saturation within the soil layer

component.name: LandSurfSoilHydrology
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfSoilHydrology required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Does the model use a tiling scheme within soil hydrology?

parameter.name: NumberOfGroundWaterLayers
parameter.definition: Enter the number of ground water levels used in the land surface scheme/model

parameter.name: WaterStorageMethod
parameter.definition: Describe the method by which water is stored in the land surface scheme/model

parameter.name: NumberOfGroundIceLayers
parameter.definition: How many ground ice layers are included in the land surface scheme

parameter.name: IceStorageMethod
parameter.definition: Describe the method of ice storage

parameter.name: Permafrost
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of permafrost within the land surface scheme

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Specify the treatment of runoff

constraint.name: if Method is "differentiated drainage and runoff"

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Specify processes treated within the runoff and drainage scheme

component.name: LandSurfSoilHeatTreatment
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfSoilHeatTreatment required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Is tiling used in the treatment of soil heat?

parameter.name: NumberOfGroundHeatLayers
parameter.definition: How many layers are used in ground heat treatment?

parameter.name: HeatStorage
parameter.definition: Specify the method of heat storage

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Describe processes included in the treatment of soil heat

component.name: LandSurfaceSnow
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceSnow required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Is tiling used in the land surface snow scheme?

parameter.name: NumberOfSnowLayers
parameter.definition: How many snow layers are included in the model?

parameter.name: SnowAlbedo
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of the ratio of reflected to incoming solar radiation on a snow surface

parameter.name: SnowDensity
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of snow density

parameter.name: SnowWaterEquivalent
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of the 'snow water equivalent'

parameter.name: SnowHeatContent
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of the heat content of snow

parameter.name: SnowTemperature
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of snow temperature

parameter.name: SnowLiquidWaterContent
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of the snow liquid water treatment

parameter.name: SnowCoverFractions
parameter.definition: Specify cover fractions used in the surface snow scheme

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Implemented snow-related processes

component.name: LandSurfaceVegetation
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceVegetation required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Is tiling used in the surface vegetation scheme?

parameter.name: VegetationType
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of vegetation type

parameter.name: VegetationMap
parameter.definition: Name and reference for the vegetation map used.

parameter.name: Interception
parameter.definition: Vegetation interception of rainwater represented?

parameter.name: BiomeTypes
parameter.definition: Names of biomes represented

parameter.name: Phenology
parameter.definition: Description of the treatment of vegetation phenology

parameter.name: LAI
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of the leaf area index

parameter.name: Biomass
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of vegetation biomass

parameter.name: BioGeography
parameter.definition: describe the treatment of vegetation biogeography

parameter.name: StomatalResistanceFunctionOf
parameter.definition: Specify the dependancies on vegetation stomatal resistance

component.name: LandSurfaceEnergyBalance
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceEnergyBalance required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Is tiling used in the surface energy balance scheme?

parameter.name: SubsurfaceTiling
parameter.definition: Is sub-surface tiling employed?

parameter.name: NumberOfSurfaceTemperatures
parameter.definition: Enter the number of surface temperatures used

parameter.name: TypeOfEvaporationFormulation
parameter.definition: Specify the formulation method for land surface evaporation

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Describe whih processes are included in the energy balance scheme

component.name: LandSurfaceAlbedo
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceAlbedo required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Is tiling used in the surface albedo calcualtions?

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of snow-free land albedo

parameter.name: FunctionOf
parameter.definition: Describe the dependancies on snow free albedo calculations

parameter.name: Direct-Diffuse
parameter.definition: Is there a distinction between direct and diffuse albedo?

value.name: distinction between direct and diffuse albedo
no distinction between direct and diffuse albedo

parameter.name: NumberOfWavelenghBands
parameter.definition: Enter the number of wavelength bands used

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of snow-covered land albedo

parameter.name: FunctionOf
parameter.definition: Describe dependancies on snow albedo calculations

component.name: LandSurfaceCarbonCycle
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceCarbonCycle required

component.name: VegetationCarbonCycle
component.definition: Definition of component type VegetationCarbonCycle required

parameter.name: NumberOfCarbonPools
parameter.definition: Enter the number of carbon pools used

parameter.name: ListOfCarbonPools
parameter.definition: List the carbon pools used within the model carbon cycle

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Describe the method used for photosynthesis

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of autotrophic respiration

parameter.name: MaintenanceRespiration
parameter.definition: Definition of property name MaintenanceRespiration required

value.name: leaves + fine roots + stems and roots

parameter.name: AllocationBins
parameter.definition: Specify the allocation of vegetation carbon bins

value.name: leaves + fine roots + coarse roots + stems

parameter.name: AllocationFractions
parameter.definition: Describe how the fractions of allocation are calculated

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of vegetation carbon cycle phenology

value.name: implicit (spectral vegetation indices NDVI or SR)

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Describe the methods used within the soil carbon cycle scheme

parameter.name: NumberOfCarbonPools
parameter.definition: How many soil carbon cycle pools are used?

parameter.name: ListOfCarbonPools
parameter.definition: List the names of the soil carbon pools used

parameter.name: ListOfGases
parameter.definition: Which gases are included in permafrost?

component.name: RiverRouting
component.definition: Definition of component type RiverRouting required

parameter.name: SpecificTiling
parameter.definition: Tiling of basins.

parameter.name: Resolution
parameter.definition: Is the resolution independant of the land surface resolution?

parameter.name: NumberOfReservoirs
parameter.definition: Enter the number of reservoirs

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: Specify the prognostic variables within the river routing scheme

parameter.name: WaterRe-evaporation
parameter.definition: Definition of property name WaterRe-evaporation required

parameter.name: CouplingWithAtmosphere
parameter.definition: Is river routing coupled to the atmosphere model component?

parameter.name: DrainageMap
parameter.definition: What type of drainage map is being used?

parameter.name: QuantitiesExchangedWithAtmosphere
parameter.definition: Which quantities are exchanged between river routing and the atmosphere model components?

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Specify how rivers are discharged to the ocean

parameter.name: QuantitiesTransported
parameter.definition: Which quantities are exchanged from river-routing to the ocean model component?

component.name: LandSurfaceLakes
component.definition: Definition of component type LandSurfaceLakes required

parameter.name: CouplingWithRivers
parameter.definition: Are lakes coupled to the river routing model component?

parameter.name: QuantitiesExchangedWithRivers
parameter.definition: Which quantities are exchanged between the lakes and rivers

parameter.name: IceTreatment
parameter.definition: Is lake ice included?

parameter.name: LakesAlbedo
parameter.definition: Describe the treatment of lake albedo

parameter.name: LakesDynamics
parameter.definition: Which dynamics of lakes are treated? horizontal, vertical, etc.

parameter.name: DynamicLakesExtent
parameter.definition: |Is a dynamic lake extent scheme included?

parameter.name: EndorheicBasins
parameter.definition: basins not flowing to ocean.
